## ToolboxSeparator.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `ToolboxSeparator` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(separatorDef: toolbox.SeparatorInfo, toolbox: IToolbox);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  separatorDef | [toolbox.SeparatorInfo](./blockly.utils.toolbox.separatorinfo.md) | The information needed to create a separator. |
|  toolbox | [IToolbox](./blockly.itoolbox.md) | The parent toolbox for the separator. |
